name: Puzzle Pocalypse
description:
Do you like puzzles? Do you like Horror? Do you like games that combine multiplayer, party time, horror and puzzlers? Well, this is the game for you then! In Puzzle Pocalypse, you are stuck on the top floor of your school which has been overcome by zombies. Your goal is to get together with your friend and escape the school finding solutions to mysteries problems along the way.

Still In Development. (Very early phase)

Version.1.0.0
